_sText:
Gungame map: gg_ruby first beta
After many month of work and a total time of 4 month and 15 days (10/11/08) since I've uploaded the first screenshot of my pink stripe idea, this map has finally come to an end - almost. I'm presenting the first beta of an awesome designed map with a very well thought-out gameplay called gg\_ruby due to the pink colors. RUBY is based on the neon texture 'technology' and uses textures as main source of light. This allows the mapper to play with many light settings such as indirect lights coming from corners or spawning behind objects. Together with the contrast colors black and grey the pink neon stripes look even better! I hope you like the style and design of this map and give me nice suggestions for my next release of this map. Much thanks to Zerberus and his idea-help and x-X^ for all the support! Also thanks to my testers for the time you spent. www.krustyworld.de
